solution_line_template: Since they are paid ${pay_per_man_per_hour} each per hour of work and can complete a job in one hour, they earn a total of ${pay_per_man_per_hour}*{men_count}=$<<{pay_per_man_per_hour}*{men_count}={earnings_per_job}>>{earnings_per_job} together for an hour of work.
If they earn together ${earnings_per_job} for one job, for the five jobs, they'll earn ${earnings_per_job}*{num_jobs}=$<<{earnings_per_job}*{num_jobs}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
